f7f377f5065c11d31b29fb8df19a14220ffb8500.commitMessage:
Remove redundant throws declarations. #1555

Fixes `RedundantThrows` inspection violations.

Description:
>This inspection reports exceptions that are declared in a method's signature but never thrown by the method itself or its implementations/derivatives.

f1e80e4ecae727087ca135dfd02f72e2d6213efb.commitMessage:
Rename variables with 'standard' names of unexpected types. #1555

Fixes `StandardVariableNames` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any variables with 'standard' names which are of unexpected types. Such names may be confusing. Standard names and types are as follows:
* i, j, k, m, n - int
* f - float
* d - double
* b - byte
* c, ch - char
* l - long
* s, str - String

add2bdfb27494bff5fa9c305d9782f57c6170b18.commitMessage:
fixed bug 561616 (ant task should log errors, not infos)

This required a redesign of the AuditListener interface, the get/setOutputStream methoeds have been removed, as there might be listeners that have no or more than one OutputStream.

The DefaultLogger now differentiates between info messages ("started checking file ...", etc.) and error messages (style errors found by checkstyle) by writing the messages to two different OutputStreams.
